code: static QueryExplanation createRandomQueryExplanation(boolean isValid) {     String index = "index_" + randomInt(1000).     int shard = randomInt(100).     Boolean valid = isValid.     String errorField = null.     if (!valid) {         errorField = randomAlphaOfLength(randomIntBetween(10, 100)).     }     String explanation = randomAlphaOfLength(randomIntBetween(10, 100)).     return new QueryExplanation(index, shard, valid, explanation, errorField). }
@Override protected QueryExplanation doParseInstance(XContentParser parser) throws IOException {     return QueryExplanation.fromXContent(parser). }
@Override protected QueryExplanation createBlankInstance() {     return new QueryExplanation(). }
